title: UniKeep Stamp Collection Organizer/Case - Holds 150 Stamps
features: Includes 10 crystal clear, archival safe pages
15 pockets per page fits 150 stamps (or 300 stamps if used back to back) - no stamps are included with the kit
Fully enclosed and snap locking so nothing falls out
Easily fits into a bag or on a bookshelf
description: The UniKeep Stamp Collection Kit is the best way to begin your stamp collection or add on to a growing collection. Our crystal clear, archival safe pages will keep your stamps in mint condition. With the ability to hold up to 150 or 300 back to back. The unique snap locking and fully enclosed case prevents anything from falling out, allowing you to also store loose items. 3 locking rings open to remove or rearrange pages. 150 mounting squares included to give your stamps a professional display appeal. Small enough to carry in a purse or bag and easily fits in a tight spot on a shelf.

title: UniKeep Stamp Collecting Case
7 Rows Pockets Stamp Album for Collectors
Stamp pages in variety of styles for Binder
AS0108BK 160 Pockets
